amendment.description: Amendment provides civil liability protection to persons who donate fire control or fire rescue equipment to a volunteer fire company.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 109-77 to better equip and protect our communities' firefighters and encourage donations by raising the liability standard for donors of fire fighting equipment from negligence to gross negligence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
